meta.job_title: Staff Acute Care Float Registered Nurse

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care, post-operative care, and critical care in various healthcare facilities.
Adapt to different healthcare settings and manage patient care across different units.
Administer medications, perform diagnostic tests, and assist in medical procedures as required.
Document patient care and maintain accurate medical records.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ensure coordinated patient care and treatment plans.
Assess patient health, provide patient education, and ensure patient safety and comfort.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) or Associate Degree in Nursing (ADN) with relevant licensure
